events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and still have not received any shipping updates. The delivery is very late and I’m getting frustrated.
The customer's complaint involves a delayed delivery with no tracking information provided so far.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the delivery delay issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear your order is delayed. I will help you track it and resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the delivery address so I can look into the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 987654 and the delivery address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thank you for the details. We have located your package, which is stuck at a regional shipping hub due to logistics delays. We are expediting the shipment and expect delivery within three days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the quick response and hope the package arrives soon.
We confirm that your package has been delivered today. Please let us know if there are any further issues or if you need more assistance.
Just checking in to ensure that your delivery experience has improved and to see if we can assist with anything else.
As no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We appreciate your feedback.
